items.sentence: Tom says he has no desire to do that anymore.
If you don't like Tom, just try to avoid him.
Tom asked me to help him write a love letter.
Does Tom like the same kind of music as Mary?
Tom has got to be in this building somewhere.
Tom tried on the coat to see if it would fit.
Tell Tom I don't know where his car keys are.
I was told Tom would be difficult to talk to.
I wanted to tell you, but Tom told me not to.
I told Tom I couldn't do it without his help.
I think you should tell Tom what you told me.
Have you told Tom why you don't like it here?
Do you think Tom will stay in Australia long?
Do you think that Tom will come to Australia?
I don't think Tom has ever been to Australia.
I expect Tom will go to Australia next month.
I didn't know Tom had relatives in Australia.
I didn't know that Tom would go to Australia.
Does Tom know that you're going to Australia?
Everyone here but Tom has lived in Australia.
